abstract: Adding support for Facebook Chat, Meebo shows how people are forging connections across the Web.
snippet: Adding support for Facebook Chat, Meebo shows how people are forging connections across the Web.
lead_paragraph: For Internet users whose instant messaging proclivities span numerous systems -– AOL’s AIM, Yahoo Messenger and Microsoft Messenger, for example -– Meebo is a hugely useful tool.

headline.main: Instant Messaging Site Meebo Adds Facebook Chat
